caption.title: Top 10 regional increases in populations experiencing year-round temperature suitability for transmission (12 months).
caption.p: Regions are ranked based on millions of people exposed for the first time to any transmission risk; parentheticals give the net change (first exposures minus populations escaping transmission risk). All values are given for the worst-case scenario (RCP 8.5) in the longest term (2080).
Click here for additional data file.
